testimonials.quote: Anton was a terrific partner to me in developing an MVP of a web app I've been dreaming of for ages. He is a highly skilled developer, a super resourceful problem-solver, and a conscientious and communicative collaborator. Hiring someone you don't know to build your idea can be scary, and I'm grateful I found my way to Anton.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Anton was FANTASTIC. Super knowledgeable and very friendly and generous with his time. He helped me even after our contract was over. Will definitely be contacting him for help (it doesn't matter what stack, he knows it ALL!), in the future!
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Anton was really great for the consultation project - very good communicator and knowledgeable with expertise in the exact subject matter we were looking for. Will work with again in the future.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Anton was amazing to work with. Not only was he quick to respond whenever we communicated but also eager to help. He wanted to make sure I understood what he was doing.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: On an hour consultation, he killed it. He didn't just talk, we got work done during the call. He was very knowledgeable on pretty much everything I needed and I'll work with him more.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: I've been working with Anton for over a year now and as always he does a fantastic job. A few months back, we were having major problems with the code and Anton fixed it all.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: I've been working with Anton for 7+ months now, and he has been a remarkable tech lead for my first app. He was always there to answer my questions, give advice, and provide solutions.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Anton was awesome! Very responsive, communicative, and flexible. I'd highly recommend using Anton for any project.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Anton is one of the best developers I have ever worked with on Upwork and I will be starting another contract with him. He's been able to come onto the project and make an immediate impact.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Anton is amazing to work with. He's honest with you, and clear with his communications. He's very gracious and super skilled and talented with programming and is great at translating requirements.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: I engaged Anton for some feedback on a startup project. He delivered insight above my expectation and was extremely helpful in honing my MVP idea. He highlighted the pros and cons of different approaches.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Anton was extremely technical, professional, and communicative! I would highly recommend Anton and would be happy to work with him on future projects.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Anton gave us expert, honest feedback on our code structure and was very thorough in his code review. Even though he was half-way across the world, he was still willing to accommodate our schedule.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Anton is an extremely knowledgable software engineer. He is very personable and his command of the English language is excellent. He is an enthusiastic, responsive, self-starter and a very fast learner.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Excellent mentor, we will definitely keep working together.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: I love working with Anton, he is a nice guy, keeps me updated of the progress and get the job done. I will continue to work with him into the future.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Excellent expertise and attention to details. Would recommend him as a mentor.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Very cooperative and clear in communication!
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Needed Anton for a small task and he did an awesome job. Quick, professional and super easy. He is worth every cent and I look forwards to working with him again.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Anton is a great guy! My team and I have work with him a lot and will definitely work with him more in the future. Anton's communication is great, with detailed explanations.
testimonials.author: Client

testimonials.quote: Anton Shubin and Partners are my GO-TO when it comes to web development! Anton is so wonderful to work with, I know my project is in safe hands when I hire him.
testimonials.author: Client
